Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • Database

  • public class Database
extends java.lang.Object
    The Database class uses the SQLite.JDBC library to serialize the repositories between user sessions.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Database(java.lang.String dbName)
      Constructor.
      Database(java.lang.String driver, java.lang.String dbName)
      Constructor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.sql.ResultSet fetchSQL(java.lang.String sqlString)
      Execute a pull query on the database.
      void shutdown()
      Disconnect from the database
      java.lang.Integer updateSQL(java.lang.String sqlString)
      Execute a push query on the database.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Database

        public Database(java.lang.String dbName)
        Constructor. This will construct a Database instance using the org.sqlite.JDBC driver
        Parameters:
        dbName - name of the database that this class will connect to

      • Database

        public Database(java.lang.String driver,
                java.lang.String dbName)
        Constructor. Allows to specify a different driver.
        Parameters:
        driver - driver for the database
        dbName - name of the database that this class will connect to

    • Method Detail

      • fetchSQL

        public java.sql.ResultSet fetchSQL(java.lang.String sqlString)
        Execute a pull query on the database.
        Parameters:
        sqlString - SQL string query
        Returns:
        result of the query

      • updateSQL

        public java.lang.Integer updateSQL(java.lang.String sqlString)
        Execute a push query on the database. Should only insert one entry at a time.
        Parameters:
        sqlString - SQL query string
        Returns:
        generated id of the entry

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
        Disconnect from the database
